name: OlaClick
headline: Restaurant Solution (E-commerce via WhatsApp + POS + CRM/Marketing)
description:
OlaClick makes it easy for mass market restaurants in Latam to create a digital menu, promote it instantly with only one click and start receiving simple food orders though WhatsApp. 

We have +40000 restaurants in Latam and we increase their sales by 40%.

contact: founders@olaclick.com

founders.name: Carol Riboud, Founder
founders.description:
Hi !

From France but spent most of time leaving in LATAM. 
Previously exited Busportal.pe to redbus ( Naspers company ) now fully dedicated Olaclick. 

Love surfing, arts, books and travel !

founders.name: Ulysse Lichtle, Founder
founders.description:
I'm french, living in Peru since 2012. I worked in 5 countries between Europe and Latam. My strengths lay on commercial strategy and project planning. 

I graduated from a Master in Management&IT and a Master in Journalism. I built my professional experience in transportation industry and tourism.

founders.name: Jose RICO, Founder
founders.description:
I‚Äôve worked for more than 15 years in strategy and operations consultancy in the, Tech, Telecom, Retail, Media and Food sectors.I speak 4 languages and have lived in 9 countries. Ex-Google dedicated to Rappi

Now:

Cofounder at OlaClick
Founder America Invertida LLC [Angel Investor + Production Company]

generated_description:
OlaClick is a dynamic startup that provides an innovative solution for the restaurant industry in Latin America, combining e-commerce, point of sale (POS), and customer relationship management (CRM) over WhatsApp.

### Key Details:
- **Founded**: 2020
- **Headquarters**: Lima, Peru
- **Team**: 30 employees
- **YC Batch**: W21

### Mission:
OlaClick aims to empower mass market restaurants to easily create digital menus, promote them instantly with just a click, and manage orders seamlessly through WhatsApp. It's particularly appealing for restaurants looking to boost efficiency and sales.

### Impact:
With over 40,000 restaurants currently using its platform, OlaClick claims to increase sales by an impressive 40%. It handles more than 1.3 million orders a month, making a substantive mark in the region's food-tech landscape.

### Product Offerings:
OlaClick brilliantly integrates various functionalities necessary for restaurants, including:
- **Digital Menu**: Easy to set up and updated instantly.
- **WhatsApp Ordering System**: Streamlines the ordering process.
- **Delivery Management**: An integrated system without third-party interference, allowing real-time sales.
- **Kitchen Display System (KDS)**: Helps organize kitchen operations efficiently.
- **Real-time statistics**: Advanced analytics to track performance and trends.

### Pricing:
Their services start at a competitive rate of R$39 per month, appealing to a broad range of restaurant owners.

### Support and Community:
Backed by support from giants like Google and Meta, OlaClick provides real-time multilingual support to its clients, ensuring that users receive prompt assistance whenever needed.

### Contact:
- **Email**: founders@olaclick.com
- **Website**: [OlaClick](https://www.olaclick.com)

In short, OlaClick is on a mission to redefine how restaurants operate in the digital age, making it simpler and more profitable for them to thrive in a competitive market. If you're in the restaurant industry looking to streamline operations and increase sales, OlaClick offers a compelling, easy-to-adopt solution.
